#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
vector<int> mark(1000001);
void mark_vis(int i)
{
    int k = 2,l=0;
    while(l<=1000000)
    {
        l = i * k;
        if(l<=1000000)
        mark[l]=1;
        k++;
    }
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    vector<int> prime;
    for(int i=2;i<1000000;i++)
    {
       if(mark[i] == 0)
       {
           mark[i]=1;
           prime.push_back(i);
           mark_vis(i);
       }
    }
    while(t--)
    {
        int l,r;
        scanf("%d%d",&l,&r);
        vector<int>::iterator it;
        it = lower_bound(prime.begin(),prime.end(),l);
        int i = distance(prime.begin(),it);
        int c=0;
        while(prime[i]<=r)
        {
            c++;
            i++;
        }
        cout<<c<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
